Harmonize As Christian Workers. 

                                Sanitarium, Cal., March 5, 1906. 

To the Officers of the Southern Union Conference: 
                 Dear Brethren:-- 
     I wish to write a few words to you, to accompany an article explaining why I am hoping that the Nashville Sanitarium shall be placed on the Madison School farm. If the school and the sanitarium will blend in their influence, this will prove to be a great advantage to both institutions. There are troublous times before us, and for years the plan of having a school and a sanitarium placed so that they can work in connection with each other, has been presented to me as the Lord's plan.
